properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from South Santee River to Edisto Beach SC out 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 20 at 3:08PM EST until January 21 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Charleston SC
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, north winds 15 to 25 kt
with gusts up to 30 kt and seas 3 to 5 ft expected. For the
Gale Watch, north winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and
seas 5 to 8 ft possible.

* WHERE...South Santee River to Edisto Beach out 20 NM.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, from 7 AM to 7 PM EST
Tuesday. For the Gale Watch, from Tuesday evening through
Wednesday afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and seas.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 7 PM EST TUESDAY... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON
